S04bsu025_u:4_0: atha te tīrthikā upalambhadṛṣṭayaḥ savikalpāḥ savitarkā mahāyānikamupasṛtya sādarakṛtāñjalipuṭā
S04bsu025_u:4_1: nairātmyapraśnaṃ paripṛcchanti sma - nairātmakaṃ śarīramiti kulaputra sarvajñena nirdiśyate /
S04bsu025_u:8: tadasmākaṃ saṃdehaṃ mocayitumarhati bhagavān - kimasti śarīre paramātmā,
S04bsu025_u:15: yadyasti, tatkathaṃ mārṣāḥ keśanakhadantacarmaromasirāmāṃsāsthimedamajjāsnāyuplīhāntranālaśiraḥkaracaraṇāṅgasakalaśarīre sa bāhyābhyantare vicāryamāṇe na dṛśyate paramātmā?
S04bsu025_u:16: tīrthikāḥ prāhuḥ - na dṛśyate kulaputra paramātmā /
S04bsu025_u:19: mahāyānikāḥ prāhuḥ - na mārṣā divyacakṣuṣo 'pi paśyanti /
S04bsu025_u:20: yasya na varṇo na rūpaṃ na saṃskāraḥ,
S04bsu025_u:27: tīrthikāḥ prāhuḥ - yadi kulaputra nocyate astīti vā nāstīti vā,
S04bsu025_u:29: mahāyānikāḥ prāhuḥ - na mārṣāḥ kiṃcidālambanaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu025_u:43: punaraparaṃ dvau bhedau vinirdiṣṭau yaduta saṃvṛtiḥ paramārthaśca /
S04bsu025_u:46: evaṃ jīvaḥ puruṣaḥ pudgalaḥ kārakaḥ vedakaḥ /
S04bsu025_u:50: evaṃ na jīvo na pudgalaḥ na puruṣaḥ na kārakaḥ na vedakaḥ na dhanaṃ - - - - - sā madhyamā pratipattirdharmāṇām /
S04bsu025_u:58: muktimārgaṃ na paśyanti andhā bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ /
S04bsu025_u:61: paramārthaṃ na jānanti bhavo yatra nirudhyate /
S04bsu025_u:64: bhavaṃ cyutiṃ tathā loke punarāyānti yānti ca // 6 //
S04bsu025_u:68: cyutirasti ca sarveṣāṃ tatsarvaṃ saṃvṛteḥ phalam // 8 //
S04bsu025_u:70: punaste narakaṃ yānti tatsarvaṃ saṃvṛteḥ phalam // 9 //
S04bsu025_u:77: na kāṭhinyaṃ na ca mṛdutvaṃ na coṣṇaṃ naiva śītalam /
S04bsu025_u:78: na saṃsparśaṃ na ca grāhyaṃ bodhicittasya lakṣaṇam // 13 //
S04bsu025_u:79: na dīrghaṃ nāpi vā hrasvaṃ na piṇḍaṃ na trikoṇakam /
S04bsu025_u:80: na kṛśaṃ nāpi na sthūlaṃ bodhicittasya lakṣaṇam // 14 // (#
S04bsu025_u:82: na śveta nāpi raktaṃ ca na kṛṣṇaṃ na ca pītakam /
S04bsu025_u:90: sarvaṃ ca tena sādṛśyaṃ niḥsāraṃ budbudopamam /
S04bsu025_u:94: abhrāntare yathā vidyut kṣaṇādapi na dṛśyate /
S04bsu025_u:96: krīḍitaṃ hasitaṃ nityaṃ jalpitaṃ ruditaṃ tathā /
S04bsu025_u:97: nṛtyaṃ gītaṃ tathā vādyaṃ sarvaṃ svapnopamaṃ hi tat // 22 //
S04bsu025_u:99: svapnaṃ ca cittasaṃkalpaṃ cittaṃ ca gaganopamam // 23 //
S04bsu025_u:101: sa sa rvapāpanirmuktaḥ prāpnoti paramaṃ padam // 24 //
S04bsu025_u:106: atha te tīrthikāstuṣṭā vikalparahitāstadā bhāvanāṃ samādhāya mahāyānayajñalābhino 'bhūvanniti //
